title: Unable to connect to games

embed.description: The easy way to save screenshots, GIFs, and websites. Make everyone happy by sharing smarter, faster, and with your point crystal clear.

body:
So usually after every update it wont let me connect to the game, I'm able to log in, search for a game and join champion select, but for some odd reason I cant join the loading screen nor the game, and when I restart my game it says "Reconnect" but nothing happens(check the link). I tried doing it whilst my firewall is turned off, but its the same result.
Anyone have this problem and fix it before?

replies.body:
Hey there,

wow, that's odd.

Could you run through the [Troubleshooting Connection Issues KB](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) article for me, let me know if anything helps.
